label.image_url: What is the URL for the rally logo?
label.name: What is the name of the rally (include the year)?
label.start_date: On what date does the rally start?
label.stop_date: On what date does the rally end?

message.createError: There was an error creating the rally. Please try again.
message.updateError: There was an error updating the rally. Please try again.

subtitle.view: Click on a name to see that singer's tramp card for this rally.

page1.description: Choose an Excel file containing singer information. The first worksheet will be read and imported.
page1.title: Select an Excel File

page2.description: Map the columns from your Excel file to the corresponding fields in our system.
page2.fieldsFound: Found {{count}} field(s) in the Excel file:
page2.info: Map each imported field to a corresponding singer database field. Fields left unmapped will be ignored.
page2.noFields: No fields found in the Excel file.
page2.title: Map Fields

page3.description: Review the data that will be imported based on your field mappings. Make sure everything looks correct before proceeding.
page3.title: Review Data

page4.description: Finally, confirm that you want to import the data. Once you proceed, the system will process your Excel file and populate the singers accordingly.
page4.genericError: An error occurred during import. Please try again.
page4.processing: Processing your data. This may take a few moments…
page4.title: Import Data

page5.description: The singers have been successfully imported! Click the “Finish” button to view the rally.
page5.title: Import Complete
